articles.title: I've been wearing my mom's locket since she died. When I lost it in London, a stranger found it for me.
articles.description: Katharine Horgan's mom died when she was 7 years old. She left her jewelry and cards, which she treasured. She found the locket at a cafe in London.

articles.title: Boeing secured a new customer for its most important plane as it finally restarts production
articles.description: The deal is worth nearly $7.4 billion to Boeing, providing some relief for the struggling planemaker as it battles production and quality problems.

articles.title: Aldi isn't my family's primary grocery store, but I'll always make a special trip there for these 8 things
articles.description: Although Aldi isn't my family's primary grocery store, I love stopping there for fresh fruit, gluten-free snacks, and the Aldi Finds aisle.
